XenotypeDef.label: Nephilim
XenotypeDef.description: Nephilim are said to be grotesquely enormus offspring of a Grigori and a human. Angels describe them as a most unnatural, foul, cannibalistic monstrosity in the shape of a mankin.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Nephilim are said to be grotesquely enormus offspring of a Grigori and a human
